channel.title: Refined Power not working after recent mod loader update
channel.description: Hi folks anyone else having this issue? i've had to disable "Refined Power" and "Programmable Elevators" as the game crashes with them enabled. its only just started to happen. This is on Steam by the way.

item.title: Refined Power not working after recent mod loader update

it was fixed a few hrs ago just a few .json changes that forked us over

item.title: Refined Power not working after recent mod loader update
item.dc:creator: @Lee_Owen Lee Owen
item.description:
@Lee_Owen wrote:

Hi, I’ve got a similar thing happen, updated the mod this afternoon and now getting this error
“SML has crashed: Module failed to load: D:\Steam\steamapps\common\Satisfactory/.cache/RefinedPower/UE4-RefinedPower-Win64-shipping.dll”

Can anyone point me in the right direction to get this fixed?
Absolutely loving the mod!

I’m also on steam too

Thank you

Read full topic
